DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent At least 18 year inclusion At least 20 teeth expect functional balanced occlusion restoration In need one implant replace teeth remove maxilla within region 15 25 Presence intact extraction socket follow removal natural tooth define : ( 1 ) situation marginal border facial bone crest deviate less equal 2 mm expect normal anatomy site/region , ( 2 ) marginal border potential facial fenestration least 3 mm apical marginal bone crest Presence extraction socket anatomy , follow removal natural tooth , suitable cylindrical conical/cylindrical implant Untreated rampant caries uncontrolled periodontal disease Absence adjacent ( mesial and/or distal ) natural tooth root Uncontrolled diabetes ( subject history reveal absence control insulindependent / noninsulin dependent Diabetes Mellitus ) Current alcohol drug abuse Systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Need systemic corticosteroid medication would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration History radiation head neck region History chemotherapy within 5 year prior surgery Unable unwilling return followup visit period 3 year 6 month Unrealistic esthetic demand Unlikely able comply study procedure accord Investigators judgement Involvement planning conduct study ( applies Astra Tech staff staff investigational site ) Previous enrolment study
